templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The BaseUrl to the ADP Workforce environment

templateOptions.label: ClientID
templateOptions.description: The ClientID for the ADP Workforce environment. This will be provided by ADP

templateOptions.label: ClientSecret
templateOptions.description: The ClientSecret for the ADP Workforce environment. This will be provided by ADP

templateOptions.label: CertificatePath
templateOptions.description: The location to the 'private key of the x.509 certificate' on the server where the HelloID agent and provisioning agent are running. Make sure to use the private key for the certificate that's used to generate a ClientID and ClientSecret and for activating the required API's

templateOptions.label: ProxyServer
templateOptions.description: The URL (or IP Address) to the ProxyServer in the network. Leave empty if no ProxyServer is being used

templateOptions.label: Import from JSON file (For testing purposes only)
templateOptions.description: Use this in combination with the JSON file to test the import of the workers without making API calls to ADP Workforce

templateOptions.label: JsonFile containing the workers. (For testing purposes only)
templateOptions.description: The location to the 'JSON file containing the workers' on the server where the HelloID agent and provisioning agent are running.

templateOptions.label: JsonFile containing the departments. (For testing purposes only)
templateOptions.description: The location to the 'JSON file containing the departments' on the server where the HelloID agent and provisioning agent are running.
